sentences: Keeras singiviilu toruks ja pistis suhu.
context: The Estonian word 'toru' has multiple meanings depending on context. It can refer to 1) a hollow cylinder made of various materials like metal, concrete, plastic, rubber or glass that transports substances; 2) something shaped like a tube in form (like rolled-up trouser legs); 3) the barrel of a firearm; 4) a wind instrument; and colloquially, 5) a foolish or stupid person.
